About Tanaka Mawere

Passionate about creating innovative solutions at the intersection of technology and healthcare. Currently balancing medical studies with full-stack development and music.

I pretend to exercise at times.

Medicine

Music

I play the keyboard and bass. I then pretend to know what I am doing on the drums, acoustic guitar, marimba and in singing.
